columns.Headphone_ID: The unique identifier for each headphone model.
columns.Model: The name or identifier of the headphone model.
columns.Class: The classification category of the headphone.
columns.Driver-matched_dB: The sound pressure level matched to the driver specifications.
columns.Construction: The materials used in the construction of the headphone.
columns.Earpads: The type of earpads used for comfort and sound isolation.
columns.Price: The retail price of the headphone.

headphone.table_description: The table lists details of various headphone models available.

columns.Store_ID: The unique identifier for each store.
columns.Name: The name of the store location.
columns.Neighborhood: The neighborhood where the store is located.
columns.Parking: The parking availability at the store.
columns.Date_Opened: The date when the store first opened.

store.table_description: The table lists information about different store locations.

columns.Store_ID: The unique identifier for each store holding stock.
columns.Headphone_ID: The unique identifier for each headphone model in stock.
columns.Quantity: The number of units available for each headphone model.

stock.table_description: The table tracks stock levels of headphones per store.
